body.name: Jafanda Air Purifier for Large Rooms (up to 1190 sq ft), Dual HEPA & Carbon Filters, Air Cleaner Removes Allergens, Dust, Pollen, Smoke, Odors, Pet Dander - PM2.5 Monitor & Night Light
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 15 hrs 19 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 15 hrs 19 mins
features: Breathe Fresh Air Every Hour: Jafanda Air Purifier cleans 1190 sq ft spaces once, 595 sq ft spaces twice, and 238 sq ft spaces five times per hour (CADR: 153CFM/260m³/h)

Eliminate Odors, Smoke, & VOCs: Jafanda Air Purifier features a 300g activated carbon filter that absorbs unwanted smells, smoke, and volatile organic compounds (VOCs). Enjoy clean, fresh air delivered quietly and efficiently in your home, bedroom, office, kitchen, basement, dorm, apartment, or living room.

Breathe Easy While You Sleep: Jafanda Air Purifier operates silently at just 23dB in Sleep Mode, ensuring fresh air for you, your baby, and your parents without any disruption. Enjoy peaceful nights and wake up feeling refreshed.

PM2.5 Display & Easy Operation: Jafanda Air Purifier features a built-in PM2.5 sensor that displays real-time air quality data. Choose from 5 fan speeds, or let Auto Mode adjust the airflow based on the actual air quality and room size. Enjoy peace of mind with Sleep Mode and Child Lock, ensuring a comfortable and safe environment for everyone.

Worry-Free Lifetime Warranty: Your purchase includes 1x JF260 Air Purifier (pre-installed with 2 filters), 1x Power Adapter (DC 24V), and 1x User Manual. Enjoy a comprehensive warranty with 1 year guaranteed from purchase date and an additional free year after product registration using your order ID and purchase date. For any concerns or questions, please don't hesitate to contact Jafanda - we're here to help you breathe easy!

Genuine Jafanda Filters: Optimize Performance with Genuine Filters. Only use authentic Jafanda replacements (Search B0B5TDGR7N) for guaranteed peak performance and reliability. Avoid inconsistent, unreliable off-brand filters that may damage your air purifier.

Save Energy, Save Money: Jafanda Air Purifier boasts a low 32W maximum power consumption, significantly lower than other large-range models. Our ECO Auto Mode intelligently adjusts fan speed based on air quality, turning off completely when "Very Good" is reached, maximizing energy savings and reducing your bills.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful Air Purifier for Large Rooms Enjoy fresh, clean air throughout your home with the Jafanda JF260 air purifier. Its powerful filtration system effectively cleans rooms up to 1190 square feet, removing 99.97% of airborne particles as small as 0.01 microns. Breathe easy and experience the difference that clean air can make.
Dual H13 True HEPA & Activated Carbon Filtration for Cleaner Air

The Jafanda JF260 air purifier features dual H13 True HEPA & Activated Carbon filters to remove 99.97% of airborne particles as small as 0.01 microns, including dust, pollen, mold, smoke, pet dander, Odor and VOCs. Breathe easier and enjoy a healthier home environment with the Jafanda JF260.

Clear the Air, Breathe Clean Experience the difference of clean air with the Jafanda JF260 air purifier. Say goodbye to indoor air pollution and enjoy fresh, purified air that's free from dust, mold, pollen, smoke, pet dander, VOCs, Odor and other airborne contaminants.

Hassle-Free Air Purifier with Advanced Features Experience the convenience and efficiency of the Jafanda JF260 air purifier, featuring 2-in-1 filter replacement, sleep mode, timer, energy-efficient operation, 3-level LED dimmable night light, child/pet lock, and automatic mode. Breathe easy and enjoy a healthier home with the Jafanda JF260.
